message.content: {"given_definition_quality":40,"better_definition":"a particle showing ongoing action (like \"-ing\")","sentence":"他在唱歌着。","image_prompt":"A cheerful young person singing a song, notes floating in the air, freeze-framed as if the action is continuing, with a soft apocalypse animation style: dreamy lighting, gentle colors, faint surreal background hints of a world ending but in a calm, beautiful way.","sentence_translation":"He is singing."}
